name: Chriswright47.github.io
body:
### Chris Wright.
I am an aspiring software craftsman. I recently learned the Ruby on Rails application framework and love creating projects from scratch. I believe in the agile software development movement and value the intra-team interactions that lead to beautiful code and working software. I am constantly pursuing my passion of becoming a full-stack software craftsman, and have recently completed Dev BootCamp in Chicago as a way to jump-start my journey.

Check out my [personal website](http://chriswright.herokuapp.com) to see some more information about me and some of my side projects.

I am currently located in Portland, Oregon with my dog Foster doing freelance web development.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
